argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumcl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumcl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumcl.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumcl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | isumcl.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 |  | summulc.6 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_isummulc2 | |- ( ph -> ( B x. sum_ k e. Z A ) = sum_ k e. Z ( B x. A ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_isumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. CC ) |
| 9 | 8, 6 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A x. B ) = ( B x. sum_ k e. Z A ) ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( A x. B ) = ( B x. A ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z ( A x. B ) = sum_ k e. Z ( B x. A ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 9, 12 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A x. B ) = sum_ k e. Z ( A x. B ) ) |
